<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>441b8c89-d386-4622-a083-7c1a9b8d1710#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Helyezd a támadások időpontját a megfelelő nyilakra a térképen!</string>
            <string language="en">Place the date of the assaults onto the appropriate arrows on the map!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plazieren Sie das Datum der Angriffe auf die 
passenden Pfeile auf die Karte!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placez la date des assauts sur les flèches 
appropriées sur la carte !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coloque a data dos assaltos nas setas apropriadas
no mapa!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disponga la data degli assalti sulle frecce 
adatte sul programma!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοποθετήστε την ημερομηνία των επιθέσεων επάνω στα 
κατάλληλα βέλη στο χάρτη!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Ponga la fecha de los asaltos sobre las flechas 
apropiadas en la correspondencia!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A feudális magyar állam kialakulása</string>
            <string language="en">The development of the feudal state of Hungary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, német támadás, 1051, 1044, térkép, Interaktív feladat</string>
            <string language="en">history, German assault, 1051, 1044, map, interactive task</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Entwicklung des Feudalzustandes von Ungarn</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement de l'état féodal de la Hongrie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento do estado feudal de Hungria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo del feudal dichiara dell'Ungheria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάπτυξη της φεουδαρχικής κατάστασης της Ουγγαρίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo del estado feudal de Hungría</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, deutscher Angriff, 1051, 1044, Karte, 
interaktive Aufgabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire, l'assaut allemand, 1051, 1044, carte, 
interactive chargent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history, assalto alemão, 1051, 1044, mapa, tarefa 
interativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia, assalto tedesco, 1051, 1044, programma, 
operazione interattiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία, γερμανική επίθεση, 1051 ..1044, χάρτης, 
διαλογική στοιχειώδης εργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia, asalto alemán, 1051, 1044, correspondencia, 
tarea interactiva</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
